ai-atk-vin02a414:1_0: He teaches the way: “He fortnights and refuses his mind.” He mental dawn as he does not get up early, he pleasure in full awareness, and he discontent with the mind.
ai-atk-vin02a414:1_1: Whatever (good) intentionally having intentionally approval, he gets up with grass and old mind.
ai-atk-vin02a414:1_2: Formerly the one who has already got up, flaws downwards with grass and leaves because of the mind,
ai-atk-vin02a414:1_3: The one who confess the other thinks, “Anyone who has full mind,”
ai-atk-vin02a414:1_4: “I do acknowledge the teaching.” He says, “I’m dealing with a mind like this,” and “Death is skillful.” He is exhorted and upying the skillful,” he is exceedingly skillful.
ai-atk-vin02a414:1_5: When he was angry and upset, he got up from his seat, covered with grass and leaves without hindrances.
ai-atk-vin02a414:1_6: if he teaches the Buddhas although giving the instructions of the Buddhas, “I’m a skilled in the teaching,” and he does so, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-atk-vin02a414:1_7: Recollecting he gives up unprofitable things and gives full admission to a woman who is skilled in the way already described.
ai-atk-vin02a414:1_8: But when he is shaking off the sandals, he uses without trouble. He is skilled in the way already described, discontent, and so on. He should understand, “This is unskillful.”
ai-atk-vin02a414:2_0: First it is said in the first position: in the way already described, etc., and it is because of the origin of it.
ai-atk-vin02a414:3_0: for all kinds of fondness in the lower particular components rolling on the inner skin that envelops the limitedness in the way already described.
ai-atk-vin02a414:4_0: The commentary on offenses is finished.
